author: IGN
description:
EA Sports FC 26 reviewed by Ricky Frech on PlayStation 5, also available on PlayStation 4, Switch 1 & 2, Xbox, and PC.

EA Sports FC 26’s on-pitch gameplay is the best it's been in a long time. Dribbling is sticky and responsive, passing is crisp, and goalkeepers can actually play their position. But despite the positive improvements both mid-match and across its various modes, an increased focus on monetization is more distracting than ever. Ultimate Team players have had it bad enough for years, but now, not even the Career Mode players are safe from the Season Pass woes. If you can get past the microtransaction madness, there is a noticeably better soccer game here, and that is worth celebrating – but FC 26 is also EA at its most money-hungry yet, and it’s hard not to worry about where things will go from here.
title: EA Sports FC 26 Review

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Sony is touting the current PS5 generation as the most successful of all the PlayStation generations. This comes from SIE CEO Hideaki Nishino after announcing the PS5 has made $136 billion in sales so far. In other news, the ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X have finally revealed their prices, and they won't come cheap. The most powerful one, the Xbox Ally X, will start at $999 and also comes with AI-specific features not available in the Xbox Ally, which is priced at $599. And finally, despite lukewarm sales, the Final Fantasy 7 Remake trilogy will end on a high note, according to the game's director.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: The PS5 Is the 'Most Successful PlayStation Generation Ever,' According to Sony - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
In Hollow Knight: Silksong, you can be afflicted with a poison status effect by falling into Muckmaggot water. There is a tool that you can find which negates this effect though, called the Wreath of Purity. You can find it in the Putrified Ducts during Act 2, and this video will show you how to unlock the area, where to find the Putrified Ducts map and where to find the Wreath of Purity to cure poison.

Timecodes: 
00:00 - Intro
00:34 - Starting out from Songclave
00:47 - Traveling through Memorium
01:44 - Finding the Secret Exit out of Memorium
02:29 - Traveling through the Putrified Ducts
03:34 - Putrified Ducts Map Location
03:53 - More Putrified Ducts Travel
04:52 - How to Find the Wreath of Purity
05:59 - How the Wreath of Purity Works

#HollowKnightSilksong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight Silksong: How to Negate Poison - Wreath of Purity Location

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Combat Gameplay Trailer for Yakuza Kiwami 3 as part of the Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties game, a remake to the hit action-adventure game Yakuza 3 alongside the Dark Teis standalone experience developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio. Players can get a look at the refined combat of Yakuza Kiwami 3, with plenty of attacks being hurled at enemies from fists to vending machines. Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties is launching on February 12 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties - Official Combat Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
There's no real way around it, High Halls has one of the tougher battle arenas in Hollow Knight: Silksong, so you can delay it until you're as strong as possible if you so choose. We approach it with two Nail upgrades, and you just have to be ready to manage the multiple waves of enemies and conserve resources for certain moments. We hold all our tools (Cogfly and Cogwork Wheel) until the final wave so we can blitz through it as fast as possible. We think Druid's Eye is very nice to have for this fight because it's inevitable you will take some hits and you want your Silk for healing and to use your ability. We think Rune Rage is a great option for this battle arena because it's very powerful when it hits.

Crest: Hunter
Throwable: Cogfly
Ability: Rune Rage
Tools: Druid's Eye, Weavelight, Cogwork Wheel, Compass, Magnetite Brooch

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Battle Arena/Locked Room (High Halls, Conductor's Melody)

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight Silksong is home to more bosses than you can shake a needle at, and one of the toughest roadblocks comes at the end of Act 1 with The Last Judge. This literal gatekeeper is one of the few things keeping you from reaching the Citadel. Here’s how to beat The Last Judge – or avoid her for the time being –  as well as some tips for the best equipment to bring to the fight. 

To see a video on how to get through the Mist and skip this boss, check this video: https://www.ign.com/videos/how-to-get-through-the-mist-in-hollow-knight-silksong
title: Hollow Knight Silksong - How to Beat the Last Judge (Or Skip Him Entirely!)

author: IGN
description:
Tune in on Saturday, Sept. 27 at Noon PT / 3pm ET for an exclusive interview with Dan Houser, co-founder of Rockstar Games, and IGN Senior Executive Editor, Ryan McCaffrey at LA Comic Con. Houser is also a longtime head writer and creative director of the Grand Theft Auto and Red Dead Redemption series. He'll talk about the legacy and impact of his past games and a look forward to his newer projects in development at Absurd Ventures.

#IGN #Gaming #GTA
title: IGN in Conversation with Dan Houser at LA Comic Con 2025

author: IGN
description:

Dying Light: The Beast is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The fight against Trobbio in Hollow Knight: Silksong can be a tough one as there's a lot of visual noise and you have to learn to avoid his double tornado attack. We fight him relatively early on and are lacking some important useful tools like Tacks/Conchcutter and the Architect's Crest if you want to go a heavy tools route. The Wanderer Crest would also be an option here as you want to be able to strike fast. That said, you can also use things like the Threefold Pin if you're lacking some other high-end tools at this point. We use a very basic loadout for this fight and no tools, but you can certainly do the fight faster if you want to use more powerful things.

Crest: Hunter
Throwable: Pimpillo 
Ability: Rune Rage
Tools: Druid's Eye, Weavelight, Cogwork Wheel, Compass, Magnetite Brooch

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Trobbio (Whispering Vaults)

From play guides, dice and character sheets to maps, item cards and tokens the set guides you through how to play, similar to a board game. IGN’s Nash took on the role of DM for the first time and took other IGN staff members on a quest to the Cave of Chaos… Sponsored by Dungeons & Dragons

#IGN #Gaming
title: How D&D’s New Starter Set Helps You Become A Dungeon Master

author: IGN
description:
It only took four years of waiting, but Insomniac finally followed up on their original Wolverine teaser with a proper gameplay trailer during Sony’s State of Play event. Finally, we get to hear Liam McIntyre’s Logan and see the beloved X-Man in action. And boy, is there ever some action in this new footage.

While we wait one final year until the game finally drops on the PS5, let’s break down the big Marvel Easter eggs and cameos in this trailer. From major villains like Omega Red and Mystique to a new take on one of Wolverine’s most iconic costumes, here’s what truly stood out.

Marvel's Wolverine is developed by Insomniac Games and is exclusive to the Sony Playstation 5. The game will be released in Fall 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Marvel
title: All the Marvel Easter Eggs in Insomniac's Wolverine Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Yasuo Gameplay Trailer for 2XKO, the upcoming 2v2 fighting game developed by Radiant Entertainment and Riot Games. Players will learn to master Yasuo, a fighter who makes good use of his sword to execute a flurry of strikes with the ability to harness the power of the wind to turn the tides of battle. Fight as Yasuo in 2XKO, launching into Early Access on October 7 for PC.

#2XKO #Gaming #IGN
title: 2XKO - Official Yasuo Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Pre-Order Trailer for Asus ROG Xbox Ally, a new handheld PC gaming device developed by Asus and Microsoft. Players will be able to take their gaming on the go with both the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X, combining the Xbox ecosystem with the Windows 11 platform. The Asus ROG Xbox Ally and Asus ROG Xbox Ally X are launching on October 16, with Pre-Orders available now.

#AsusROGXboxAllyX #Gaming #IGN
title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally - Official Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
OD is not a resurrection of Silent Hills, but its first gameplay trailer suggests plenty of ideas and motifs from P.T. have been carried over into Kojima's new Xbox game.

It’s not how OD replicates P.T. that’s the interesting thing – the more exciting prospect is how it will build on P.T.’s successes. And so now we look forward to learning much more about this project. After all, we know so little about it. We do know that Get Out and Nope director Jordan Peele is involved, but that he’s working on a separate OD experience, one that will replace the “Knock” subtitle with a different kind of fear. So is this an anthology of games, each one exploring unique phobias? Or will OD be a collection of different media, breaking boundaries between games and films? P.T. reimagined the shape of horror over a decade ago, of course, so we’re more than ready to see Kojima do it all over again.

#ign #od #pt
title: Is OD Connected to P.T.? Hideo Kojima’s New Horror Game Explained

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Pokémon TCG trailer to see what to expect with the Mega Evolution expansion, featuring over 180 cards, nearly a dozen Mega Evolution Pokémon ex, more than 15 Trainer cards, and more than 50 Pokémon and Trainer cards with special illustrations. The Mega Evolution expansion for Pokémon TCG is available now.

Striving to become stronger, Pokémon of all types are putting everything on the line to become Mega Evolution Pokémon ex! Harness the strong aura of Mega Lucario ex, embrace the overflowing power of Mega Gardevoir ex, and team up with more of these powerful Pokémon that boast devastating attacks and massive HP. But consider your strategy carefully—extra power brings extra risks! Choose your Pokémon partners and prepare for the biggest battles you’ve ever seen in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Mega Evolution expansion!

#IGN #Pokemon #Gaming
title: Pokemon TCG: Mega Evolution - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Hinako's journey through Silent Hill f is a complex and emotional one. In this video, we'll be going over the endings of Coming Home to Roost, Fox's Wedding, The Fox Wet Its Tail, and Ebisugaoka in Silence, breaking down their secrets and explaining what each ending means in relation to the wider Silent Hill story.

Who is Fox Mask? How is he related to Kotoyuki? How do the Shichibi, Shiromuku, and Tsukumogami boss fights tie into the SH f narrative? That, and more, is explained in our video!

So if you want to know what really happened in Ebisugaoka and the ornate realm of the Dark Shrine, then get ready for a journey through Hinako's complicated story.

00:00 Intro
01:57 Coming Home to Roost Ending
05:21 Fox’s Wedding Ending
07:32 The Fox Wet Its Tail Ending
09:54 Ebisugaoka in Silence Ending

#SilentHill #SilentHillF #IGN
title: Silent Hill f - Endings Explained

author: IGN
description: Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Daemon, Max, and Ryan take a look at this week's big reveals, starting with the Sony State of Play that dropped on Wednesday. We have a first real look at the (very M-rated) Wolverine game, gameplay of Housemarque's Saros, and more. On the Xbox front, there's a brand new trailer for Hideo Kojima's OD starring a very scared Sophia Lillis, and a teaser for Forza Horizon 6. And speaking of Xbox, the crew give their thoughts on the second price increase for Xbox hardware this year. Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.
title: 5 Years In, This Gen Just Got a Lot More Exciting (Finally) - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Join developer Heart Machine for a deep dive into Possessor(s) in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-adventure platformer game. The new Possessor(s) trailer gives a breakdown of the story, gameplay, and characters you'll meet, as well as announces a release date. Possessor(s) will be available on PC and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on November 11, 2025.

In Possessor(s) you play as Luca, a high-schooler trapped in the ruins of Sanzu City, a sprawling metropolis overrun with otherworldly horrors following an interdimensional catastrophe. Her body broken, Luca strikes a deal with Rhem, a newly freed demon in need of a host. Together, they make a last-ditch effort to survive.
title: Possessor(s) - Official Release Date and Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Formula Legends reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also available on Xbox One/Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4/5, and Nintendo Switch.

"Formula Legends is an earnest and consistently charming unlicensed homage to seven decades of F1 racing that’s one part Art of Rally and one part Micro Machines. With tracks, engine notes, and even visual filters that evolve dramatically over the decades, Formula Legends has me thoroughly addicted to exploring and unlocking its many eras of racing, and I was willing to put up with its laggy handling and its frustratingly inconsistent AI racers in order to take it all in."
title: Formula Legends Review

author: IGN
description:
First Sinner is very flashy in Hollow Knight: Silksong, but as long as you don't get distracted by the visuals, it's not too stressful. The Wanderer Crest is a good alternative to this basic build. We also only have one Needle upgrade at this point as we come here relatively early in Act 2. Using the Needolin is probably your most effective ability to utilize beyond some of the usual tools (if you have them) like Cogfly and Pollip Pouch. She also has a healing animation you want to try and interrupt as often as possible.

Crest: Hunter
Throwable: Longpin
Ability: Silkspear
Tools: Druid's Eye, Weavelight, Cogwork Wheel, Compass, Magnetite Brooch

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - First Sinner (The Slab)

author: IGN
description:
Check out 8 minutes of gameplay from Animula Nook in this new trailer for the upcoming fantasy, life simulation game set in a lilliputian world. The trailer showcases character customization options, exploration gameplay, tools including a shrinking device, the construction system, different locations, and more. Animula Nook will be available on Steam, Epic Games Store, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch 2, and Mac.

Inspired by the charm of modern animated cartoons, Animula Nook transforms everyday objects into fantastical landscapes. From towering coffee mugs to sprawling bookshelves, players become tiny explorers in a giant’s world. They can navigate and interact with oversized, real-world objects, build their own homestead, collect elements such as raindrops and wind to help with crafting, and grow crops in flowerpots.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Animula Nook - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Star Wars: Visions will return to Disney+ for a third installment on October 29, 2025.
The award-winning anthology of animated short films celebrates the mythology of Star Wars through unique cultural lenses. Star Wars: Visions Volume 3 features nine shorts from nine different anime studios—david production, Kamikaze Douga + ANIMA, Kinema citrus Co., Polygon Pictures, Production I.G, Project Studio Q, TRIGGER, WIT STUDIO—to further demonstrate the diversity and creativity of Japanese animation.

#IGN #Anime #StarWars
title: Star Wars: Visions Volume 3 - Official Trailer (English Dub)

author: IGN
description:
The Asus ROG Xbox Ally consoles launch on October 16th, marking the first time that Microsoft has released an official gaming handheld. The new ROG Xbox Ally and Ally X promise unique hardware and software improvements and could be priced aggressively, but can they compete against the Steam Deck, Switch 2, and a growing field of handheld gaming PCs? 

Here's everything you need to know about the upcoming Xbox handheld.
